PropertyDef.Name: GeologicUnitType
PropertyDef.Definition: >NOTE Definition according to GeoSciML: The type of GeologicUnit.

PropertyDef.Name: Rank
PropertyDef.Definition: >NOTE Definition according to ISC: The rank of GeologicUnit e.g., group, formation, member.

PropertyDef.Name: Lithology
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines all natural materials resulting from the combination of minerals, particles or biogenic elements.

PropertyDef.Name: GeologicHistory
PropertyDef.Definition: Human readable description, possibly formatted with formal syntax, of the age of the GeologicUnit (where age is a sequence of events and may include process and environment information).

PropertyDef.Name: RepresentativeAge
PropertyDef.Definition: A URI referring to a controlled concept specifying the most representative stratigraphic age interval for the GeologicUnit. This will be defined entirely at the discretion of the data provider and may be a single event selected from the geologic feature's geological history or a value summarising the all or part of the feature's history.

PropertyDef.Name: FaciesLithostratigraphy
PropertyDef.Definition: The characteristics of a rock or a sediment unit that reflect its environment of deposition and allow it to be distinguished from rock or sediment deposited in an adjacent environment.

PropertyDef.Name: FaciesPetrophysics
PropertyDef.Definition: A rock mass that can be recognized by its composition, structures or fossil content and mapped on the basis of those characteristics.

PropertyDef.Name: GeologicalHazard
PropertyDef.Definition: Relates the presence or absence of a certain geological hazard, like e.g. hazardous minerals (asbestos, serpentine) or gas.
